dt-option.name: buttons.dom.container.className
dt-option.summary: Set the class name to use for the Buttons container element

type.description: The class name. Multiple classes can be given using space separation.

dt-option.description:
This option controls the class name of the tag that contains the buttons that Buttons will create. By default the buttons container element will float to the left (i.e. in CSS `float: left`). To have it float to the right, this property can be used to add the the class `-string buttons-right` to the container (see example below). This is currently the only special class that is built into the Buttons stylesheets. Please refer to the `b-init buttons.dom` documentation for an overview of the DOM structure that Buttons will create. In this specific case, this option controls the class name of the `
...
` element that is shown in the example HTML there.
